title.rendered: “IDF Decimates Terrorist Targets: Inside the Successful Strikes on Six Hezbollah Strongholds in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military buildings and a post from which firings were carried out towards the north of the country; Documentation: IDF attacked and destroyed terrorist targets in six areas in Lebanese territory

A short while ago, the IDF completed a wave of attacks on terrorist targets in the territories of Al-Adaisseh, Al-Hiyam, Rab al-Talatine, Deir Siriane, Aita al-Shaab, and Mahibib in southern Lebanon.

As part of the attacks, Air Force fighter jets destroyed five military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization, along with another military post used by the organization, from which firings were carried out towards the north of the country.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/4bz3XUq
